input_text:
LEAD ARTIST

SUMMARY

I'm a fast-learning and enthusiastic animator seeking professional experience.
I have over 7 years of formal art training, both digital and traditional.
I'm skilled at design and character animation.
Software Skills
Animation: Toon Boom Harmony, TV Paint, Adobe Flash Illustration: Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Aseprite, Paintool SAI, Gimp Post-Production: Adobe After — Effects , Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro
